page.title: 17MEDIA: NEWS FROM POYNTINGTON
page.content: Although residents of a very rural area no one needs to be isolated from the world news nor from events in the immediate neighbourhood.A Sunday and a week day delivery of{newspapers}is available from the Corton Denham village shop.In Poyntington an inventive self help rota operates to fetch the papers every morning from nearby Sherborne to a village distribution point.The weekly "Western Gazette" news covers adjoining counties.{Parish news}comes through the monthly Queenthorne Newsletter delivered free to every home in Poyntington by the Churches team ministry. There is also a bi_monthly leaflet of Corton Denham News from their church.{Free publications}such as the "Blackmore Vale Magazine" are read for their local interest and advertisements.
